query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `smsNotificationLog` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `notificationId` int,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `phoneNumber` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `provider` enum('twilio','aws_sns','custom') NOT NULL,
  `messageId` varchar(255),
  `status` enum('pending','sent','delivered','failed','undelivered') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  `deliveredAt` timestamp NULL,
  `failureReason` text,
  `cost` bigint DEFAULT 0,
  `segments` int DEFAULT 1,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `smsNotificationLog_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  KEY `notificationId_idx` (`notificationId`),
  KEY `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
)
command:

  `segments` int DEFAULT 1,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

  CONSTRAINT `smsNotificationLog_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  KEY `notificationId_idx` (`notificationId`),
  KEY `userId_idx` (`userId`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `createdAt_idx` (`createdAt`)
)
